entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 27. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016
